name: ChartFont
description: This object represents the font attributes (font name, font size, color, etc.) for a chart object.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: bold
properties.description: Represents the bold status of font.

properties.name: color
properties.description: HTML color code representation of the text color. E.g. #FF0000 represents Red.

properties.name: italic
properties.description: Represents the bold status of italic.

properties.name: underline
properties.description: Type of underline applied to the font.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
